meanings.definition: A sheet of waterproof material used as a protective covering for the ground.
meanings.sent1: During the camping trip, we spread out the groundsheets to keep the ground dry.
meanings.sent2: The groundsheets were essential to prevent the moisture from seeping into the tent.
meanings.sent3: The groundsheets decided to have a dance party to show off their waterproof skills.
meanings.sent4: The groundsheets were like superheroes, shielding the earth from the rain's attack.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the groundsheets' ability to transform the muddy ground into a dry haven.

meanings.definition: The area of land on which a tent is pitched.
meanings.sent1: We carefully chose a flat spot for the tent within the groundsheets.
meanings.sent2: The groundsheets extended far enough to accommodate the entire tent.
meanings.sent3: The groundsheets were so proud to support the tent like a sturdy foundation.
meanings.sent4: The groundsheets embraced the tent, creating a cozy shelter under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The groundsheets marked the perfect spot for our camping adventure.
